post:
Quick news from the hard working folks at XVM Labs: We've upgraded our gear, plus we have rolled out some important upgrades to our backend. This means we have a few spots available:

128 MB RAM, 3 GB SSD, 100 GB monthly data transfer - $2.75/year

512 MB RAM, 5 GB SSD, 100 GB monthly data transfer - $4.75/year

1024 MB RAM, 15 GB SSD, 300 GB monthly data transfer - $9.75/year

512 MB RAM, 50 GB SSD, 100 GB monthly data transfer - $14.75/year

1024 MB RAM, 100 GB SSD, 300 GB monthly data transfer - $26.75/year

Monthly terms are available too. Order at: https://xvmlabs.com/
